original: pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a sv'a dha nam /
analyzed: pradznya pa ra mi ta sva dha nam

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba sgrub thabs

original: sngar bshad pa'i rim pas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes thogs la /
analyzed: sngar chad ba rim ba stong ba nyid sgom ba rjes thogs la

original: padma dmar po'i zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge dh'i: ser po yongs su gyur pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ser mo ste /
analyzed: padma dmar po zla ba la gnas ba yi ge dh: ser po yongs su gyur ba las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ser mo ste

original: ral pa dang dbu rgyan gyi mtha' na mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa /
analyzed: ral ba dang dbu rgyan gyi mtha na mi skyod ba bzhugs ba

original: chos bshad pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa /
analyzed: chos chad ba phyag rgya mdzad ba

original: po ti dang ldan pa'i autpala sngon po g-yon pa'i zur na bsnams pa /
analyzed: po ti dang ldan ba autpala sngon po g-yon ba zur na snom ba

original: stod g-yogs dang stod shag bsnams pa /
analyzed: stod g-yogs dang stod shag snom ba

original: lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang rgyan mnga' ba zhes bya ba de lta bur bsgoms la /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi na bza dang rgyan mnga ba zhes byed ba de lta bur sgom la

original: aom dh'i:shru ti smri ti bi dza ye sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas par bya ba'o //
analyzed: aom dh:shru ti smri ti bi dza ye sva ha zhes byed ba sngags bzlas ba byed ba

original: mdor bsdus pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs so //
analyzed: mdor sdud ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba sgrub thabs so

original: m'a la ba zhes bya ba dha byang chub sems dpa'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: ma la ba zhes byed ba dha byang chub sems dpa zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis sgyur
